pageContext.claim: “I was just told by your great governor and ex-governor that your insurance companies have all fled the state of Iowa. Pretty sad, isn't it? Well, they're -- I'll tell you what, they're going from every state. They're leaving all of the states.”
pageContext.analysis: Two major insurers did leave the Iowa exchanges in April, but the regional insurance company Medica announced they will participate in the 2018 exchange. Many insurers have become incresingly hesitant to particpate in the exchanges due to ongoing uncertainity surrounding the repeal and replacement of the Affordable Care Act.
